title: What is the interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing facial hair in a dream: This vision may be one of the strange and unusual visions, but it has many different connotations and interpretations. The interpretation of this vision has been given by many dream interpretation scholars, and we will learn their opinions in detail in interpreting this vision, but the interpretation of visions varies depending on the situation. In which you saw hair in your dream, and it also varies whether the dreamer is a man, woman, or unmarried girl, and we will learn about all of these cases in detail. Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing hair appearing in an unusual place in a dream is a vision that indicates However, the dreamer is suffering from some worries and problems. But if the hair is excessive and spread over the entire face to the point of distorting its beauty, then this indicates envy and eye damage, especially if the vision is female. Interpretation of plucking hair in a dream: As for the vision of plucking facial hair and getting rid of it, it is not good. It indicates wasting money in the wrong place, and it may indicate that the dreamer is suffering from debt and lack of money. If you see in your dream that you have a white beard, this indicates poverty, but it is a sign of reverence and status among people. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, a specialized Egyptian Google website In the interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of seeing facial hair in a dream for a single girl from Nabulsi. Imam Nabulsi says that seeing hair such as a beard or mustache in an unmarried girl’s dream shows the girl’s strength and ability to endure and face problems in life. But if she sees that she is removing facial hair using “sweetening”, This means that she will get something important that will honor her in front of others, and it will solve the disputes and problems that she suffers from in life. Seeing a woman’s beard in a dream Seeing a white beard in an unmarried girl’s dream means that she will marry a poor but religious person who has a good reputation among the people. Interpretation of seeing facial hair In a dream for a woman married to Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Shaheen says that seeing facial hair in a married woman’s dream expresses some of the worries and problems that she suffers from in her life. However, if she sees that she is completely removing facial hair, this indicates that she has lost something important in life or that she is suffering from disagreements. There is a danger between her and her children and she cannot control them. Interpretation of a dream about removing hair from the legs for a single woman. Seeing unmarried women removing their leg hair in a dream is a sign of her deliverance from the things that caused her great discomfort in the previous days and she will be more comfortable after that. If the dreamer sees it during his sleep Removing hair from the legs, this is a sign of good things that will happen in her life and will be very satisfying for her. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is polishing her legs, this means that she will receive a lot of money that will enable her to pay off the debts that have accumulated over a long period of Time. Seeing the dreamer in her dream removing her leg hair symbolizes that she will solve many of the problems she was facing in her life and the circumstances surrounding her will be more stable. If the girl sees in

title: What is the interpretation of boiled eggs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Boiled eggs in a dream The interpretations confirmed by the dream of boiled eggs are good and express good nutrition, and most experts believe that there is good behind this vision for the individual, whether married or single, and if you are looking for the meaning of boiled eggs in a dream, you must follow us on the dream interpretation website to understand its connotations. Boiled eggs in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about boiled eggs confirms a dignified life full of hopes for the sleeper, and there are many cases in which there is a happy event, whether he eats them or just sees them or finds a lot of them and they are spoiled. Boiled eggs have difficult meanings and suggest the fears of life that is coming quickly in one of them. When you search for a meaning. For a man to eat boiled eggs, this confirms that he is about to take a step towards engagement and marriage, and it is possible that his partner has high authority at work and therefore has a lot of money. Boiled eggs in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. A dream about boiled eggs according to Ibn Sirin means that a person can easily earn money. And focusing well on his work and not neglecting it, even if you find many of them in your vision, it expresses your high financial level and desire. . In everything you have money and you do not lose it easily. One of the signs of seeing boiled eggs is that it is a good omen for the monarch, and if he places it in his hand, it indicates marriage, God willing, or the calm of difficult situations and harsh circumstances that a person cannot face and which causes him clear sadness. To interpret your dream Accurately and quickly, Google the interpretation of dreams on the Internet. Boiled eggs in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about boiled eggs for a single woman shows that some of the negative circumstances that controlled her in the past regarding her dreams or work will pass quickly and she will witness great development regarding her work and great success in it. As for the girl Who takes care of her studies and sees boiled eggs in her dream, this symbolizes her reaching an honorable position and overcoming any difficulty she feels during her education. Eating boiled eggs in a dream for a single woman When an unmarried woman sees herself eating boiled eggs in her dream, this is evidence that she follows a broad diet and avoids Debts.Interpretation of a dream about peeling boiled eggs for single womenInterpretation lawyers tend to the fact that peeling boiled eggs is full of happy signs for the visionary, and this is because he has many desires, but he could not achieve them in the previous days, and after seeing them he can quickly reach and compensate for some of the things that he lost.What Interpretation of a dream about eating boiled egg whites for a single woman? Jurists interpret the vision of eating boiled egg whites in a person’s dream as a sign of the death of any sadness and sorrow and the ease of his circumstances. Apart from forming an emotional relationship that leads to a successful and blessed marriage. The interpretation of a dream about eating boiled eggs for single women also symbolizes a feeling of comfort and relaxation and shows that the girl is a little satisfied. What are the ramifications of seeing boiled eggs in a dream for unmarried women? Seeing yourself peeling boiled eggs in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates revealing what is hidden and concealed It may also indicate that this is the case

title: Interpretation of seeing a book in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a book in a dream via the website vision roy2a.com. Seeing a book in a dream indicates status, power, sustenance, and money. An open book indicates kindness, comfort, security, and the kindness of the dreamer. Religious books indicate piety and faith. In this article, we will explain the interpretation of seeing a book in a dream. For men, unmarried young men, unmarried women, as well as married and divorced women for some imams. Such as Imam Ibn Shirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other translators in the modern era, so please follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing a book in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Whoever sees that he is carrying a collection of books indicates prestige, authority and prestige. Dreaming about books on religion, jurisprudence and Sharia in The dream indicates guidance, repentance, or the dreamer’s benevolence and avoidance of immorality and disobedience. If a person sees that he is holding a book in his left hand, this means that he has committed many sins. Seeing a folded book in a dream indicates the approaching term. See also: Interpretation of seeing a dead person writing in a dream. What is the interpretation of a vision? A book in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a book in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates their high status and achieving the highest grades. If an unmarried girl sees an open book and gets engaged, this indicates the approaching date of her wedding. If the girl sees that the books of jurisprudence and religious books indicate her religion And the strength of her faith and righteousness. See also: Interpretation of seeing a sharpener in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a book in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a library full of books in a dream for a married woman indicates a lot of wealth, kindness, and stability in her married life. If a married woman sees an open book in her dream, this indicates The relationship of love and tenderness between her husband and wife, marital happiness and family stability. If a married woman sees a torn book, this indicates marital problems and quarrels. See also: Interpretation of seeing a pen or pen in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a book in a dream for a pregnant woman? If a pregnant woman sees books in the gallery. In a dream, this indicates rest after fatigue and ease of childbirth, because it indicates wealth and affluence. Seeing an open book for a pregnant woman in a dream indicates ease and ease of childbirth, as it indicates the birth of a newborn child. See also: Interpretation of seeing pencils in a dream. What is the interpretation? Seeing a book in a dream for a divorced woman? If a divorced woman sees an open book in her dream, this indicates the stability of her physical and psychological life and her comfort after fatigue. If a divorced woman sees that she is buying books in a dream, this indicates the stability of her material and social life and her moral stability. What is the interpretation of a dream about losing a book in a dream? Seeing a lost book in a dream indicates difficulty in making the right decisions, confusion, and randomness. Dreaming about losing a book for a married woman in a dream indicates the instability of her marital life and the lack of anything important in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing a library in a dream? Seeing a library of papers and books in a dream It means a bright future, hope and optimism

title: Interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing garlic in Nabulsi’s dream. Seeing garlic in a dream means forbidden money. It is the most important interpretation of this vision among interpretive scholars, but it differs whether the garlic is cooked, peeled, or minced in the dream. This is why Nabulsi's interpretation is clearer in the garlic symbol. Some cases of garlic are good, especially in the dream of a pregnant woman, as well as in the dream of an unmarried person. The meaning of garlic in a dream is as follows: Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing garlic in a dream. Garlic in a dream indicates money collected from prohibited or illegal sources, as eating garlic may indicate recovery from illness and marriage to an unmarried young man. Garlic indicates the acquisition of money and increased profit, and the money collected may come from prohibited sources. Seeing garlic in The dream: If they are cooking garlic, it has been proven that the dreamer is repenting for some of his sins. Eating garlic without cooking it raw means that you are on the path of discontent and error. Seeing garlic in a dream usually means illicit money, that is, money from forbidden sources. Dreaming of a sick person with garlic means getting rid of Illness and the recovery phase will begin soon. Peeling garlic, especially for a woman, is joy and happiness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing garlic in a dream for a man, a married woman, and a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about garlic for a man: Garlic in a men’s dream means money, especially for merchants. Interpretation of taking garlic in a dream, for example Buying it in the market means that stress will disappear. If a man is single and takes garlic, it means marriage if he is engaged, or engagement if he is not related. Buying garlic means good luck. Peeled garlic means marriage to a previously married woman who has children. See also: Interpretation of seeing onions in a dream for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about garlic for a single woman: Seeing garlic in a dream, if an unmarried woman plans to open new projects and sees garlic in the house, on the window, or on the threshold, this means that this new project is forbidden. And if he wants to get married Garlic means the engagement date is approaching, but he will marry a foreigner and may travel with him outside the country. A woman who holds a different nationality, even if she is divorced, could mean a return to her husband. Likewise, a girl who broke off her engagement, meaning a return to her fiancé. If the garlic is peeled, it means Marriage to a man who was previously married and has children. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing onions in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about garlic for a married woman: Giving an interpretation of garlic in a dream means that you are a woman who spends money on those in need. If she is unmarried and gives garlic to anyone, this means marriage. Chopping garlic in a dream It means that this woman is attacking people and her behavior is bad. If she cuts garlic, this means that she has enmity between her family and problems and quarrels or the death of one of her family members. Interpretation of a dream about garlic for a pregnant woman: It is good to see garlic in a pregnant woman’s dream. It is different from seeing garlic for a married and single woman. Because it indicates To abundant livelihood, and to the birth of a boy, and garlic indicates the death of fatigue and pain. Garlic means easy birth and good health for the newborn.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi: The virtue of reading Surat al-Baqarah is great for a person in his life, as it repel sorrows and harm and alleviate difficult circumstances. What are the things that are expected to happen in the sleeper’s life, and after that we will learn the details of that. Interpretation of the dream of reading Ayat al-KursiReading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream has various meanings. Sometimes a person reads it very easily and enjoys reading it, and the interpretation emphasizes protecting him in reality, and keeping him reading it constantly so that he is always in the protection of God - Glory be to Him - while if one faces difficulty in reciting Kursi, he is helpless and hopeless in real life and wishes for salvation from an evil problem staring at him. However, if the mother finds herself reciting Ayat al-Kursi to one of her children, then she is waiting for the blessed days, depending on his circumstances and age, for they are full of contentment and compassion. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi by Ibn SirinOne of the most beautiful things that the scholar Ibn Sirin showed by reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream is that it is a medicine and a cure for a person, if he wishes. God protects him from everything that harms and hurts him, whether it is sadness or illness. In addition, it is a sign of doubling the means of livelihood and psychological stability. Reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream is one of the things that indicates a person’s attachment to the verses of God - the Almighty - and his closeness to them always in his life, such as Reciting Ayat Al-Kursi to your children to protect them. From envy and evil, good luck always, thanks to God. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google’s online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of the dream of reading Ayat al-Kursi for a single woman. There are many situations that a girl can see when she reads Ayat al-Kursi in a dream, and this dream is to release her and get the joy she wants. If an unmarried woman reads Ayat al-Kursi, the dream means that she remembers some of her old relatives and friends and hopes to meet them again, along with the beauty of her voice while reciting it, which expresses news that is characterized by comfort. And happiness. And you will hear from someone you love in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat Al-Kursi for a married woman: Whoever sees that she is reading Ayat Al-Kursi in her prayer, and her voice is distinctive and makes her feel comfortable, the dream is interpreted as a woman always addressing God Almighty and asking Him for forgiveness and mercy and accepting a worship imposed on her, that is: Good manners, and extreme religiosity. But if she reads this great verse to her husband or children, the interpretation of the vision proves that she always cares for them and her clear love for them, and she prays to God Almighty to protect them from all evil and asks for the sick among them to be healed. Sometimes a married woman sees that she She recites Ayat al-Kursi over a dead person or inside a cemetery and repeats it out loud, and the dream becomes an indication of her constant adherence to praying for those whose family has died, and she gives it. Charity on their way. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat Al-Kursi for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman may see the recitation of Ayat Al-Kursi while she feels anxious and crying in her eyes. Experts in interpreting this dream indicate that she is disturbed by the issue of her pregnancy and feels afraid for her child. Ayat Al-Kursi by Ajmal A.

Charity on their way. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat Al-Kursi for a pregnant woman: A pregnant woman may see the recitation of Ayat Al-Kursi while she feels anxious and crying in her eyes. Experts in interpreting this dream indicate that she is disturbed by the issue of her pregnancy and feels afraid for her child. Ayat Al-Kursi by Ajmal A.

title: Interpretation of a dream about old cheese according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about old cheese in a dream for single women, married women, and pregnant women in a dream. This dream is one of the dreams that some people search for to know its correct interpretation and what it leads to in dreams. Like old cheese, it is considered one of the most famous types of cheese and the most expensive where it is made. Dreaming about old cheese in a dream, according to what interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi say. Interpretation of a dream about old cheese in a dream: Old cheese is one of the most famous types of cheese, as it is used in many expensive dishes, and is used as an appetizer alongside food, so seeing it in a dream has many interpretations. We will show you a group of them as follows: Seeing Quraish cheese is evidence of the ease of earning a living. Thus, seeing white cheese indicates good news and happy events. Interpretation of seeing yellow cheese is a sign of neglect, bad news, and illness. Seeing rum cheese is a sign of good luck and life. Good. Thus, the interpretation of a dream about old cheese indicates negligence in some business and not making the right decisions. Seeing selling cheese is a sign of a new way of thinking about successful projects. Old curd cheese also suggests gossip and gossip. It also indicates engaging in bad deeds and pursuing Misfortunes and personal interests. Old cheese also indicates corruption in the dreamer’s life. Old cheese can also indicate illness and disease. See also: Interpretation of a dream about twins in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing yellow cheese for a married woman. There are many people who like to eat yellow cheese because of the pleasure it brings Especially, some of them like to put it in many foods to give it a creamy texture, and seeing it in a dream indicates many meanings, as Ibn Sirin explained to a married woman. . It is as follows: Seeing white cheese in a dream is a sign of a safe, stable, and abundant life. But seeing white cheese in a dream without bread is evidence of praiseworthy events, unlike eating it on bread. Seeing cheese and cutting bread is evidence of some problems that this woman faces. Seeing pieces of cheese indicates some minor problems that the dreamer will face and they will end quickly. Seeing cooked cheese indicates an increase in profits and an abundance of livelihood. Seeing cheese with pieces of bread is a sign of a poor and anxious life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about preparing to travel in a dream for a son. Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about cheese for a pregnant woman: A dream about cheese for a pregnant woman is considered something that has many connotations indicating good or bad, which makes some people search for the interpretation of these dreams in a dream, according to what Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi said, so we will find out. To interpret the vision of cheese in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing white cheese in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of an economical, easy and painless birth. Seeing yellow cheese is evidence of birth problems for this woman and she may stumble. Old cheese indicates corruption in the dreamer’s life and the acquisition of abundant money, but from sources Illicit. Old curd cheese also suggests gossip and gossip. It also indicates engaging in evil deeds and seeking

title: Interpretation of a dream about ghee for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a dream of ghee in a dream for singles “They said it was a false dream, and we do not interpret dreams with two worlds, learn about the interpretation of seeing a dream of ghee in a dream for singles in the various cases in which ghee appears. God does not know dreams and whoever does not know the unseen must interpret them God Almighty. Among the most prominent interpreters of Ibn Sirin, who is considered one of the most important imams of dream interpretation. In the world, and in the interpretation of fat, we convey different points of view from the great imams of dream interpretation, and dreams cannot be interpreted without knowledge. Interpretation of a dream of ghee in a dream for a single woman Seeing ghee in the dream of an unmarried girl is a generally promising vision. It symbolizes the happiness and joy that come to her and the qualities of a good and good girl. Interpretation of ghee in a dream for a single woman Buying mistletoe often symbolizes the girl's imminent marriage to a righteous man. The unmarried girl saw that he wanted to buy mistletoe and searched for a long time to find it. This expresses the good that will come to her soon. If an unmarried girl sees mistletoe in her dream with its beautiful smell and flat shape. This symbolizes the lawful money that the girl earns. Ghee in a dream and butter in general, in the dream of an unmarried girl, symbolizes the happiness and good luck that awaits her. If a girl dreams that she is buying ghee to prepare sweets. This indicates that she will soon hear good and happy news. Seeing ghee in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates her marriage to a righteous man who will make her happy. Seeing an unmarried girl eating ghee in a dream symbolizes the good that will come to her and live her from God Almighty. Seeing a single girl in her dream with liquid ghee symbolizes the presence of many obstacles and difficulties that stand in the way of the girl. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is tasting mistletoe. This dream symbolizes the approach of joy, goodness and pleasure in the girl's life, and it also shows the end of all sorrows, difficulties and worries in her life. Seeing a girl in a dream tasting bad mistletoe, this vision is an unpleasant vision and indicates that this girl will enter into an unsuccessful romantic relationship that will end soon. If a girl dreams that she is eating mistletoe. This expresses the qualities that distinguish this girl and the noble morals that adorn her chastity, chastity, chastity, contentment and righteousness. Interpretation of a dream about pouring ghee Seeing ghee thrown on the ground with the far-sighted owner trying to collect it and not being able to do so is an unpleasant vision. It indicates approaching many problems and difficulties in the life of a shrewd person to achieve a specific goal he wants to reach, although in the end he will reach what he hopes for. To see ghee falling to the ground, knowing that the seer is not trying to collect it again, with the dreamer's desire to get rid of it, symbolizes that this person has made many mistakes that he can correct later. Interpretation of a dream about a box of ghee Seeing a box of ghee in a dream for an unmarried woman expresses the abundance of sustenance that awaits her and the amount of goodness depends on the size of the box of ghee that she saw in the dream. Interpretation of seeing ghee in a dream

Ibn Sirin explained in the interpretation of the dream, the belly in Dreaming, that this is evidence of goodness, money, and increasing wealth. Abdominal folds in a dream indicate great losses and huge debts. Dreaming of a large belly in a dream is evidence of saving money and keeping secrets. Seeing a belly in a dream can also mean an increase in offspring, and an increase in the number Children, and it can refer to relatives and friends. Dreaming of a belly and navel in a dream is evidence of the family and home that the dreamer has in reality. Of blessings. Abdominal pain in a married woman’s dreams is evidence of betrayal and betrayal by relatives or close friends. For a married woman, an exposed abdomen proves great benefits to her husband. For a married woman, the excessive size of the abdomen indicates that her husband illegally took a lot of money. A dream about a pregnant woman: A dream about having a large belly indicates that she will give birth to a boy, and this will cause her Happiness. Opening the abdomen during a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the earliest date of childbirth and her safety and the safety of the fetus. title: Interpretation of killing the stomach in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Killing a gecko in a dream This vision carries within it many interpretations and connotations, and these interpretations differ from one person to another, and although the weight in a dream can cause confusion, anxiety and panic to the person who sees it, this vision can indicate the goodness and livelihood that will come to the dreamer. In his life, we will present the most prominent interpretations in this article. Killing a gecko in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about killing a gecko in a dream means that the dreamer has a great ability to eliminate everyone around him in his life who cause him harm or harm. A gecko in a dream may indicate a genie or the devil who The dreamer is already dressed, because the features of the stomach are very similar to the features of genies or devils in general, and these qualities include speed, great movement, and running. Killing a goose in a dream by Ibn Sirin According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, if one sees a gecko in a dream, this means that the dreamer is a corrupt character. It is false and enjoins people to corruption and immorality and distances them from grace. Bite him and eat a large part of his flesh, this is evidence that there is a person very close to him, but he does not love him, hates him intensely, and talks about him in the worst way. The vision may also indicate that there is someone close to the dreamer who is trying to steal his effort and his lineage for himself, despite the dreamer’s efforts and efforts. The location is characterized by The web specializing in online dream interpretation with a selection of the leading interpreters of dreams and visions in the Arab world. To access it, type the online dream interpretation site in Google. Killing a gecko in a single woman’s dreamMany interpreters state that killing a gecko in a dream is for a single girl, especially if she is going through a difficult period full of sadness resulting from an emotional relationship or a financial crisis in her life, but In both cases, the vision indicates that these hardships and that these temptations and crises will end in a very short time. If the girl sees that she killed the gecko in a dream and then got rid of him, this vision indicates that she will fall into a very big problem, but she is saved, thank God, from it. To be a failure in her life or a failure in a relationship. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a goose in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a goose in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates sincere repentance to God Almighty and seeking forgiveness for the sins and disobedience she committed in her life. People who harbor evil for her or the pain and hardships she receives from those close to her. Slaughtering a leper in an unmarried woman’s dream symbolizes her success in a task in which there are many competitors and swindlers, but she will overcome them and reach a distinguished position. Interpretation of seeing dead geckos in a dream for a single woman: A vision A dead stomach in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates getting rid of envy, problems, or worries that the dreamer suffered from, and the interpretation of seeing a dead stomach in a girl’s dream indicates that she was saved from harm or harm that was almost inflicted on her by a close person, perhaps a friend or her family. Scientists also explain that seeing a dead stomach in a girl’s dream means living in stability and comfort

title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the news of a person’s death and crying over him

preview.html: The news of a person’s death and crying over him in a dream. When you dream that you hear the news of a person’s death in a dream, crying about it shows joy and great wealth. The vision also indicates recovery from illness if this person is sick. It can mean seeing the long life and health of the deceased. Dreaming of hearing the news of the death of a person. Who dreams of hearing the news of the death of a person Alive in reality indicates that he will soon hear happy news. As described by the problem and disputes are gone. Dreaming of a living person dying in a dream. Whoever sees a living person who has died in his dream is a sign of his long life and good health. If he is sick, this indicates his recovery from his illness and a feeling of comfort. In the case of a dream about the death of a relative and a funeral is taking place in the dreamer’s house, this indicates that happy occasions will come to this house soon, God willing. Interpretation of hearing the news of death and the crying of unmarried people He is in pain and distressed by his separation. As for her seeing that a stranger died in front of her and then came back to life while she was sleeping, this indicates that there is a not-so-rich man who is proposing to her and she agrees to him. After him, everyone around her lost trust, and she will cooperate with him and help him succeed in life. As for the one who dreams of the death of a member of her family and family and cried over him, this indicates the health of that person, his recovery from illness, and the longevity of his life. I see that I hear the news of death and cry for the married woman. When a married woman dreams that she heard Someone close to her died in a dream, and she cried hard over him, then this is a sign that there is a great danger around this person and is the reason why she survived it. And if she sees the death of her husband and screams loudly over him, this is a sign of his long life and excellent health. Perhaps it indicates the birth of a male child It will be an extension of the husband in the future. But if someone sees that her children are dying, and she screams at him and tears her clothes, this is evidence of her extreme fear and desire not to harm her. Add the dream that you would like to interpret with reference to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.
